title: Ethan Blacher
text:
Hi, I’m Ethan and thanks for visiting my site!

Education
University of California, Santa Barbara 2023

Major in Economics and Accounting, Major in Environmental Studies

Yeshivat Orayta (Gap Year Program in Jerusalem, Israel) 2019


Experience
PricewaterhouseCoopers, Los Angeles June 2022 – August 2022
Summer Intern, Financial Due Diligence

Performed buy-side and sell-side financial due diligence for private equity and corporate clients.
Analyzed financial statements, business models, and participated in management meetings to identify and assess financial and business trends.

Ralph’s, Los Angeles April 2020 – August 2020
Courtesy Clerk

Ensured costumers had an enjoyable experience shopping for groceries by being friendly and helpful.
Managed grocery bagging for multiple cashiers, sanitized store in an effort to protect against Covid-19, and collected shopping carts from the parking lot.

Camp Ramah in California June 2019 – August 2019
Summer Camp Counselor

Led a group of 20 campers in all aspects of a sleep-away camp experience.
Negotiated contracts for all child care staff, resulting in a 200 dollar salary increase and longer breaks.
